data.title: Pooja Sharma
data.meta_description: Pooja Sharma is a Nepalese actress, film producer, and singer known for her works in Nepalese Entertainment Industry. Sharma is one of the highest paid and popular actress in Nepal. Sharma debuted as an actress in 3 Lovers where she appeared as a supporting actress.
data.meta_site_name: ArtistNepal - ArtistNepal's Log In or Sign Up | Where Professional Artists meet - find musician, actor, model, dancer, photographer, director | Nepal's 1st Artists Network & Portfolio Management site.
data.text:
Pooja Sharma is a Nepalese actress, film producer, and singer known for her works in Nepalese Entertainment Industry. Sharma is one of the highest paid and popular actress in Nepal. Sharma debuted as an actress in 3 Lovers where she appeared as a supporting actress.
